mapper.sql: id, name, parent_id, code, sort, remark, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag

update.foreach:
update sys_department
name = #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
parent_id = #{item.parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
code = #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{item.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
remark = #{item.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{item.status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
create_by = #{item.createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{item.updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_date = #{item.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
del_flag = #{item.delFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
